page.title: 18WALKING AROUND BASSINGBOURN
page.content: On Tuesday July 10th we went out of the school. We walked across the play ground. We passed 5 staff houses then on the north side of the road there was a grazing field. We came to the brook and crossed over. We passed other fields of crops. We had also passed 5 houses and Low Farm. {* We turned back down a little track.{* This track led us to Wellhead. On {* the way we saw more crops. On the {* south side was a disused clunch pit.{* We walked down the last piece of {* the track over the stile and into {** the school. We were all very hot {** because of the lovely hot day. {** {A BAR CHART OF LAND USAGE ** {NORTH AND SOUTH OF BROOK ROAD *** { School X-grass/clover Clunch **** {Grazing Y-plantation Bean Hay ******** {Orchard Pea Z-potato ************** {Barley Farm Wheat House}SXCGYBHOPZBFWH
